ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the moon when it is full,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And the moon when at the full,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and by the moon, when it reaches its fullness:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: or by the moon when it is full,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And by oath of the moon when it is full.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the moon when it Ittasaq.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the moon when it grows full,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the moon when it is at the full,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And by the moon when she is at the full,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the moon when it grows full,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And by the moon when she becometh full.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by the moon when it blooms full:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the Moon in her fullness:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by the moon when it is at the full,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: by the moon, in its fullness
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And by the moon, as it grows full.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [by] the moon when it becomes full
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [84:18] and [by] the moon when it is at the full, and its light is complete, and this happens during the nights of the full moon:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And by the moon when she is at the full) for three nights: the nights of the thirteenth, fourteenth and fifteenth of the lunar month
